title/1: Definix on Klaytn Chain G2 beta launch!
content/1:
Definix Generation 2 service has been launched on Klaytn Chain.
Long-term stake and Super stack are also in the works, so please wait a little bit!
content/2:
Definix is always listening to the voices of holders.
If there are any inconveniences or improvements to the beta service, please give us feedback.
title/3: Long-term Stake on G2 is up!
content/3:
Long-term Stake is available on G2 now.
Super Stake is in the works, so please wait for a while!
